entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
